creator: marc.chamberlain@systor.com
text:
I was attempting to install/control tomcat from Visualage when I came across a 
major problem. The server could not find the the “conf.xml” file because the 
path was incorrect for NT, the path was using UNIX file separators "\". So, I 
down loaded tomcat java files and took a look at the code. I could not believe 
that there where hardcoded file separators like \conf.xml instead of 
File.separator + "conf.xml".  This happens many times over in the tomcat code.  
This makes running tomcat from VADD impossible on NT.

Please fix this ASAP.  This is a major problem for us

Thanks,
Marc Chamberlain
Won't be addressed in 3.2.2 but will be evaluated for a later release.
